artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Jesus bound with ropes at L, held by two men facing other men at R who are arguing. man seated on elevated throne at far R is talking to two men, one of whom is gesturing toward Jesus; women watch in arched window in background
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Christ again before Caiaphas
